repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
This manuscript contains a text enttitled Phullabhāshya which is a commentary on Phullasūtra of Sāmaveda and is also known as Sāmavedabhāshya. The note at the front mentions some information Phullabhāshya Commentary on Phullasūtra Sāmavedabhāshya By Ajātaśatru Grantha 314 pages 7 lines complete.
Last folio has something scribbled in the Telugu script. First blank folio after the last folio has written in granth śivayanamaḥ maheśvarayati and a design of craved circles all over the folio. Manuscript is flipped. Image 174 is folio number 1. Before the beginning of the manuscript something is written in Granth— first line is not clear as it is half broken and the text is unclear mostly. xv 1 (approximately 6 unclear syllables) pañcanavasptā ṣaṭ saptadvaya (rest of the line is unclear and broken) xv 2 sarvaṃ? . triniyamimusaubhāgyadha (1 illegible syllable) ṣaṃ kalakaṃ gatam . (pabṛtaṃ tārjyaṃ?) pritisaptama(1 illegible syllable) bandhanaṃ . aṣṭamaṃ maraṇaṃ druvaṃ navamaṃ ca xv 3 ṭṭābhihite kaṃ syām . sītācamusya lakṣaṇaṃ hariḥ oṃ hīnacakrasaṃpūrṇaṃ (5 illegible syllables.) oṃ . Two small tables are drawn beneath this, and some letters are written in the first horizontal row of the three column table.

msItem.title: Phullavivaraṇa
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 atha tālavyamā(1 illegible syllable) ya tūryaṃ . vṛddhasya tālavyasya āū bhāva ādeśo bhavati . avṛddhaṃ prakṛtiḥ. avṛddhaṃ yattālavyaṃ tat prakṛtirbhavati . iva 1v 2 rṇaṃ śaṃ ityetāni tālavyāni tālavyaśabdenocyante .
msItem.explicit: [153v] 1 daivodāsāsinnarabṛhadānte?yājīnyatau ko(2 illegible syllables) nāstedyāvidyāmāyadpurasākaḥ śvasadrāṇaṃ ṣadhasteyanmayā na buviṃ karhi(rgau?) [153v] 2 vai chandasāni eteṣu gītiprastāvatameva syāt . na pādyaḥ padyo nādeśa ityasyāyamapavādaḥ vaiścandaseṣu prāsatāvikarme pavakṛ [153v] 3 tevagānaṃ prastāvo bhavati na pādya iti . atha stādapyuktameva tasyāmūherjyāyasi chandasi yathā sā ca

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: Some folio are broken rest is in good condition.

handNote.desc: Hand writing wide letters but confusing at many places.

encodingDesc.p: last folio number is supplied. Spaces are added to separate words.
